casebody.data:
HUGHES, Respondent, v. KELLEY, Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by John F. Hughes against Michael F. Kelley.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J., and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment and order reversed on exceptions, and a new trial ordered, with costs to abide the event. Held, there was an error in admitting evidence of the entries by the plaintiff in his books of account.
